forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 21C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 70F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
